title: In Côte d'Ivoire, Alassane Ouattara wins a fourth term, marking the twilight of his rule
subhead: With more than 89% of the vote, Ivorian President Alassane Ouattara secured a fourth term on October 27, according to results announced by the Independent Electoral Commission. The election took place amid a tightly controlled political landscape.
